name: Nekoland Studio
detailed_description:
The most easy rpg game maker "Nekoland Studio"!

Make your own online mobile game and be a rpg game creator!
No need to worry about programming skill, server problem.
Just use Nekoland Studio, best game making engine.

[How to use]
1. Downloand the Nekoland Studio and Make your own game for free.
You can make your own game from IDLE to Online RPG game. And can see how it works immediately.
2. Click 'Launch' Button on Nekoland Studio (PC Program) then You can check and play on Mobile App "Nekoland".
No SDK, No additional process, No extra fee.
3. when you launch the game via Nekoland Studio, People can play the game with Friends online, leave and check the review, so can talk with players from all over the world. Also You can meet other devs and play other's game as well (all things are free)

Time to be a rpg game creator now!
Show your amazing game idea and passion to the world through Nekoland Studio, free mobile rpg game maker studio :)
Don't give up your dream! We love to make the world that everyone can create their amazing game!
Welcome to the Nekoland Studio! Please Join us and do not hesitate anything!

short_description: The most easy game maker studio,"Nekoland"Nekoland supports you can make your own game from simple IDLE to Mobile online RPG game even though you don't have any programming skill. Don't worry about server problem and extra fee. Just show your amazing idea and be a creator now.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

ext_user_account_notice: Nekoland account required to publish games

movies.name: Making ONLINE RPG GAME without programming lol
